pros: LAkeview is a great place to work. The residents are great. Pay and benefits are outstanding. No agency staff
cons: None at this time everything great
- Management is honestly the worst - Expect to be disrespected by management, employees, and residents - Expect to be ran into the ground
None that I can think of.

review_title: Great place to live, work, and grow
pros: The residents are great to work with and the staff really cares about the residents as well. Lakeview also has a great policy concerning internal promotions. You can start out in an entry level position and if you do a good job you can advance up the ladder.
cons: Pay rates could be a little higher.

pros: Good clinicians, good pay and normal hours.
cons: Management is more concerned with provided service to all vs actual need. Limited advancement for clinicians, no funding for CEUs, benefits are average.

job_title: Certified Nursing Assistant CNA in Lenexa, KS
cons: Short staffed, Pay, Management, Not being appreciated.

job_title: Dining Room Manager in Lenexa, KS
pros: Friendly co-workers and customers. Great place to work.
cons: No cons, it is a great place to work.

review_title: Great place to live work and grow!
job_title: Director of Dining Services in Lenexa, KS
pros: The company cares for their staff. Great benefits program, good people to work with. A real family atmosphere!

Good company, they try to do the right thing for the residents who live there and treat them with respect. Employees are treated well, many companies don't care about employee recognition the way Lakeview Village does. Many long term employees who make Lakeview Village their career-home.
cons: Can be difficult to work around employees if they don't have the heart for the elderly, generally those people don't last long because they aren't in the business for the right reasons and move on.

job_title: Certified Nursing Assistant in Lenexa, KS
pros: The clients and residents are amazing people and you can learn a lot from them! I got a raise just Bc they were "competing" with other nursing homes.
cons: The place is horrible! Co-workers are very drama filled and are in it for the wrong reasons! Management is horrible about listening to workers problems. They believe just because you have worked there for awhile that that worker is being honest! Management will right you up but not let you see the write ups and they lie about everything! Don't waste your time

pros: Management is poor and hours are iffy
cons: Great people to work with and free food to eat

pros: Easy flow, easy to pick up on
cons: Management can be unproductive and crumble under stress.

pros: Great place to work, awesome director, wonderful children
